body.style: .slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles{container-name:collapsibles;container-type:inline-size}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles.--coloredBg{background-color:var(--color-primary-light);padding-bottom:var(--space-16x);padding-top:var(--space-8x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__wrapper{display:flex;flex-direction:column;text-align:center}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__description{margin:var(--space-4x) auto 0 auto}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__content{margin-top:var(--space-12x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item{border-top:1px solid var(--color-primary);margin-top:var(--space-4x);padding-top:var(--space-8x);text-align:left}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__question__chevron{flex-shrink:0;height:24px;position:relative;top:5px;width:24px}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__question__chevron:after{border-bottom:1px solid;border-right:1px solid;border-color:var(--color-primary);content:"";height:10px;left:50%;position:absolute;transform:scaleY(1) rotate(45deg);transform-origin:center center;transition:transform .25s ease;width:10px}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__question__chevron--rotate:after{top:6px;transform:scaleY(-1) rotate(45deg)}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__question{align-items:flex-start;color:var(--color-primary);display:flex;font-size:var(--font-type-body-lg-fz);font-weight:var(--font-type-body-lg-bold-fw);gap:var(--space-4x);line-height:var(--font-type-body-lg-lh)}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__question>*{text-align:left}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__answer{display:grid;grid-template-rows:0fr;padding:var(--space-4x) 0 0 var(--space-10x);transition:all .25s ease-in}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__answer--open{padding-bottom:var(--space-4x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__answer>div{overflow:hidden}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__item__answer--open{grid-template-rows:1fr}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__cta__headline{margin-bottom:calc(var(--space-8x)*-1);margin-top:var(--space-16x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__collapsibles .ofx__collapsibles__cta{margin:var(--space-16x) auto 0 auto;width:max-content}.slice--overflex .ofx__headline-with-text{container-name:headline-with-text;container-type:inline-size}.slice--overflex .ofx__headline-with-text .ofx__headline-with-text__wrapper{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:var(--space-6x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__headline-with-text .ofx__headline-with-text__wrapper.--boxed{background-color:var(--color-primary);border-radius:var(--border-radius-sm);box-shadow:var(--box-shadow-sm);color:var(--color-font-light);padding:var(--space-10x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__headline-with-text .ofx__headline-with-text__wrapper.--center{align-items:center;text-align:center}.slice--overflex .ofx__headline-with-text .ofx__headline-with-text__text{max-width:var(--medium-content-width)}.slice--overflex .ofx__headline-with-text .ofx__headline-with-text__ctas{display:flex;gap:var(--space-3x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list{container-name:icon-list;container-type:inline-size}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:var(--space-6x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__container.--boxed{background-color:var(--color-primary);border-radius:var(--border-radius-sm);color:var(--color-font-light);padding:var(--space-10x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__list__item{display:flex;gap:var(--space-3x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__item__iconWrapper{justify-content:center;line-height:1;max-height:var(--space-6x);max-width:var(--space-6x);min-height:var(--space-6x);min-width:var(--space-6x);position:relative}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__item__iconWrapper img{filter:var(--color-blue-filter);height:100%;left:0;object-fit:cover;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__container.--boxed .ofx__icon-list__item__iconWrapper img{filter:var(--color-font-light-filter)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__list__item.--bulletpoint .ofx__icon-list__item__iconWrapper{align-items:center;display:flex;height:var(--space-6x);justify-content:center;width:var(--space-6x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__item__bulletpoint{background:var(--color-black);border-radius:50%;max-height:6px;max-width:6px;min-height:6px;min-width:6px}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__container.--boxed .ofx__icon-list__item__bulletpoint{background:var(--color-white)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__list li+li{margin-top:var(--space-4x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__list__item__text{line-height:var(--font-type-body-lh)}@container icon-list (max-width: 768px){.slice--overflex .ofx__icon-list .ofx__icon-list__item__iconWrapper{top:2px}}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table{container-name:price-table;container-type:inline-size}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table .ofx__price-table__wrapper{text-align:center}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table .ofx__price-table__description{margin:var(--space-4x) auto 0 auto}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table .ofx__price-table__prices{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:var(--space-10x);margin-top:var(--space-12x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table .ofx__price-table__prices__price{border-bottom:1px solid var(--color-grey-darkest);display:flex;gap:var(--space-4x);justify-content:space-between;padding-bottom:var(--space-4x);text-align:left}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table .ofx__price-table__prices__price__headline{margin-bottom:var(--space-2x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__price-table .ofx__price-table__prices__price__price{white-space:nowrap}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media{container-name:seperator-headline-text;container-type:inline-size;position:relative}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__background{background-color:var(--color-primary-dark);height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__inner{align-items:center;display:flex;min-height:400px;padding:var(--space-16x) 0;position:relative}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media.--dark .ofx__seperator-media__inner{color:var(--color-white)}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media.--boxed .ofx__seperator-media__inner{color:var(--color-font-light)}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content{text-align:center}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content__inner{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;max-width:700px}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content.--left{text-align:left}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content.--left .ofx__seperator-media__content__inner{margin-left:0}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content.--right{text-align:right}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content.--right .ofx__seperator-media__content__inner{margin-right:0}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media.--boxed .ofx__seperator-media__content__inner{background-color:var(--color-primary);border-radius:var(--border-radius-md);box-shadow:var(--box-shadow-md);padding:var(--space-8x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__headline{margin-bottom:var(--space-6x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__cta{border-radius:var(--border-radius-button);margin-top:var(--space-6x);width:max-content}@container seperator-headline-text (max-width: 1024px){.slice--overflex .ofx__seperator-media .ofx__seperator-media__content{flex-direction:column!important}}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed{container-name:teaser-icons-detailed;container-type:inline-size}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__wrapper{display:flex;flex-basis:100%;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:var(--space-6x);justify-content:center}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser{display:flex;flex-direction:row;gap:var(--space-3x);padding:var(--space-6x) var(--space-4x);width:28.57143%}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser.--boxed{background-color:var(--color-primary);border-radius:var(--border-radius-md);box-shadow:var(--box-shadow-sm);color:var(--color-font-light);padding:var(--space-6x) var(--space-6x) var(--space-8x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser__icon{height:var(--space-10x);min-height:var(--space-10x);min-width:var(--space-10x);width:var(--space-10x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser.--boxed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser__icon{filter:var(--color-font-light-filter)}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser__content{align-items:flex-start;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:var(--space-2x);margin-top:var(--space-1x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__cta{margin-top:var(--space-4x)}@container teaser-icons-detailed (max-width: 1024px){.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser{width:40%}}@container teaser-icons-detailed (max-width: 768px){.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__wrapper{gap:var(--space-2x)}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser{width:100%!important}.slice--overflex .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed .ofx__teaser-icons-detailed__teaser__content{margin-top:var(--space-2x)}}
